```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, error = FALSE}
#loading the necessary libraries 
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(rio)
```

```{r}
#importing the stuff
roster <- import("roster_for_analysis.csv")
```

```{r}
#grouping by the council
roster_first <- roster %>% 
  group_by(Council) %>% 
  count(Title)
  
fcas <- roster_first %>% 
  filter(Council == "FCAS")
```

#First graph attempt
```{r}
#realizing I dont need to make graphs for this haha
ggplot(data = fcas, aes(x = Title, y = n)) +
  geom_point()
```

# making hot tables
```{r}
college <- roster %>% 
  group_by(College) %>% 
  count(Title)

college$College <- sub("Seattle", "Medicine", college$College)
```
